Uses of Class
com.sun.xacml.combine.CombiningAlgorithm

Packages that use CombiningAlgorithm
com.sun.xacml This is the root package, which contains the PDP class where most people will want to start. 
com.sun.xacml.combine All of the combining algorithm support is in this package.

Methods in com.sun.xacml.combine that return CombiningAlgorithm
 CombiningAlgorithm BaseCombiningAlgFactory.createAlgorithm(java.net.URI algId)
          Tries to return the correct combinging algorithm based on the given algorithm ID.
abstract  CombiningAlgorithm CombiningAlgFactory.createAlgorithm(java.net.URI algId)
          Tries to return the correct combinging algorithm based on the given algorithm ID.
static CombiningAlgorithm CombiningAlgFactory.createCombiningAlg(java.net.URI algId)
          Deprecated. As of version 1.2, replaced by CombiningAlgFactory.createAlgorithm(URI). The new factory system requires you to get a factory instance and then call the non-static methods on that factory. The static versions of these methods have been left in for now, but are slower and will be removed in a future version.
 

Methods in com.sun.xacml.combine with parameters of type CombiningAlgorithm
 void BaseCombiningAlgFactory.addAlgorithm(CombiningAlgorithm alg)
          Adds a combining algorithm to the factory.
abstract  void CombiningAlgFactory.addAlgorithm(CombiningAlgorithm alg)
          Adds a combining algorithm to the factory.
 void StandardCombiningAlgFactory.addAlgorithm(CombiningAlgorithm alg)
          Throws an UnsupportedOperationException since you are not allowed to modify what a standard factory supports.
static void CombiningAlgFactory.addCombiningAlg(CombiningAlgorithm alg)
          Deprecated. As of version 1.2, replaced by CombiningAlgFactory.addAlgorithm(CombiningAlgorithm). The new factory system requires you to get a factory instance and then call the non-static methods on that factory. The static versions of these methods have been left in for now, but are slower and will be removed in a future version.
